testsuite.name: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I set How Did I Do check box to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I set the maximum How Did I Do uses to "2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I click the new question button

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I verify the maximum How Did I Do uses is set to "2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I edit the "How Did I Do Max Attempts Test Assignment" assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I click on the set policies tab

testcase.name: Then I verify the maximum How Did I Do uses is set to "2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I launch the "How Did I Do Max Attempts Test Assignment" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I enter "2x" in Mathematical Formula input
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: And I click How Did I Do in the assignment page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula answer is correct
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I assert that there is "1/2" uses of How Did I Do remaining
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I click within the How Did I Do response area to clear it
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I click How Did I Do in the assignment page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula answer is correct
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I assert that there is "0/2" uses of How Did I Do remaining
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I click within the How Did I Do response area to clear it
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I assert that the How Did I Do link has been removed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: When I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test setting the Maximum "How Did I Do?" Uses policy
